item.title: OpenWRT Deploying TAILSCALE Alternative to ZEROTIER
item.description: [Translated and formatted Markdown content] # OpenWRT Deploy TAILSCALE to Replace ZEROTIER By Rabbit Dad's Grocery Store In the context of epidemic prevention and control, many people may have the need to remotely access devices.
